title: WebPage Schema
description: A JSON Schema for the WebPage credential that represents web pages using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the web page, typically a URI.

schema:name.description: The name or title of the web page.

schema:description.description: A description of the web page.

schema:url.description: The URL of the web page.

oneOf.description: The URI of the author of the web page.

schema:author.description: The author of the web page.

oneOf.description: The URI of the creator of the web page.

schema:creator.description: The creator of the web page.

schema:dateCreated.description: The date and time when the web page was created.

schema:datePublished.description: The date and time when the web page was published.

schema:dateModified.description: The date and time when the web page was last modified.

schema:genre.description: The genre of the web page.

schema:keywords.description: Keywords or tags associated with the web page.

schema:license.description: The license under which the web page is distributed.

oneOf.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

id.description: The URI of the copyright holder.

schema:name.description: The name of the copyright holder.

schema:copyrightHolder.description: The copyright holder of the web page.

schema:inLanguage.description: The language of the web page (ISO 639-1 code).

schema:isAccessibleForFree.description: Whether the web page is accessible for free.

schema:thumbnailUrl.description: The URL of a thumbnail image for the web page.

schema:image.description: The URL of an image representing the web page.

schema:abstract.description: An abstract or summary of the web page.

schema:interactionType.description: The type of interaction being measured.

schema:interactionStatistic.description: Statistics about user interactions with the web page.

schema:isPartOf.description: The URI of the website of which this page is a part.

schema:mainEntity.description: The main entity described on the web page.

schema:about.description: The subject matter of the web page.

schema:breadcrumb.description: A breadcrumb trail for the web page.

schema:lastReviewed.description: The date and time when the web page was last reviewed.

schema:reviewedBy.description: The reviewer of the web page.

schema:significantLink.description: Significant links on the web page.

schema:specialty.description: The specialty of the web page.

schema:primaryImageOfPage.description: The primary image of the web page.

schema:relatedLink.description: Related links on the web page.

schema:wordCount.description: The number of words in the web page.

schema:characterCount.description: The number of characters in the web page.

schema:pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts.

schema:pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends.

schema:pagination.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd.

schema:isFamilyFriendly.description: Whether the web page is family friendly.

schema:dateLastReviewed.description: The date and time when the web page was last reviewed.

schema:mainContentOfPage.description: The main content of the web page.

schema:significantLinks.description: The most significant URLs on the page.
